subject: Basketball
Ratings (Audience Measurement)
Television
NBA Championship
lead_paragraph: As the Cavaliers and Warriors head to Game 6 on Tuesday, average viewership for the N.B.A. finals could hit 20 million, an elusive number that was once routine.
snippet: As the Cavaliers and Warriors head to Game 6 on Tuesday, average viewership for the N.B.A. finals could hit 20 million, an elusive number that was once routine.
